Class ArchiveIngestor

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveIngestor
@Service public class ArchiveIngestor extends Object

This class is the primary parsing utility for ingesting AO3 stories and chapters.

This class exposes it's version, placeholder value, and the tags it ignores as statically accessible objects.

This class exposes high level APIs for creating chapters and creating stories.

This class exposes a task creation method for Archive Server to access as a spring boot component.

This class uses the following settings from the application.properties file to configure itself:

  • archiveServer.ingestor.tosSleepDurationSecs
  • archiveServer.ingestor.waitDurationSecs
  • archiveServer.ingestor.maxCommentThreadDepth
  • archiveServer.ingestor.maxCommentPageLimit
  • archiveServer.ingestor.maxKudosPageLimit
  • archiveServer.ingestor.maxBookmarkPageLimit

All archiveServer.ingestor settings have a class attribute counterpart.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveIngestor

      public ArchiveIngestor(ArchiveLogService logService, ArchiveMessageService messageService, ArchiveSessionService sessionService, ArchiveDriverService driverService, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.tosSleepDurationSecs}") Integer tosSleepDurationSecs, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.waitDurationSecs}") Integer waitDurationSecs, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.maxCommentThreadDepth}") Integer maxCommentThreadDepth, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.maxCommentPageLimit}") Integer maxCommentPageLimit, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.maxKudosPageLimit}") Integer maxKudosPageLimit, @Value("${archiveServer.ingestor.maxBookmarkPageLimit}") Integer maxBookmarkPageLimit) throws IOException

      This constructor is used to start the archive ingestor. To use outside of Spring Boot, set the service parameters to null.

      Parameters:
      logService - The ArchiveLogService managed by Spring Boot. Set to null to use outside spring boot.
      messageService - The ArchiveMessageService managed by Spring Boot. Set to null to use outside spring boot.
      sessionService - The ArchiveSessionService managed by Spring Boot. Set to null to use outside spring boot.
      driverService - The ArchiveDriverService managed by Spring Boot. Set to null to use outside spring boot.
      tosSleepDurationSecs - The number of seconds to wait on TOS screen. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      waitDurationSecs - The number of seconds to enter into WebDriverWait objects. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      maxCommentThreadDepth - The number of comment thread replies to go down. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      maxCommentPageLimit - The number of comment pages to parse. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      maxKudosPageLimit - The number of kudos pages to parse. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      maxBookmarkPageLimit - The number of bookmark pages to parse. Spring Boot passes the corresponding archiveServer.ingestor value.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the resourceReader.readAllAsString() line in ArchiveIngestor.getJSONFromResource() fails due to an I/O Error.

      Throws:
      IOException - If the resourceReader.readAllAsString() line fails due to an I/O Error.

    • updateLastRecordedMessage

      private void updateLastRecordedMessage(String newMessage, String sessionId)

      This method prints the latest message from the Archive Ingestor. If a session service is present, it will also update a session's latest message through the service.

      Parameters:
      newMessage - The new message to update the session and/or print to console.
      sessionId - The session ID of the session to update.

    • updateTotalChapters

      private void updateTotalChapters(Integer chapterCount, String sessionId)

      This method updates a session's total chapter count if a session service is present.

      Parameters:
      chapterCount - The new chapter count.
      sessionId - The session ID of the session to update.

    • updateCompletedChapters

      private void updateCompletedChapters(Integer chapterCount, String sessionId)

      This method updates a session's completed chapter count if a session service is present.

      Parameters:
      chapterCount - The new chapter count.
      sessionId - The session ID of the session to update.

    • checkForCancel

      private void checkForCancel(String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method checks if a session has been canceled if a session service is present. If the session has been canceled, the Archive Ingestor throws a ArchiveIngestorCanceledException to end the running parse task early.

      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the session to check.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If the session has been canceled.

    • handleTOSPrompt

      private void handleTOSPrompt(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws InterruptedException

      This method checks for an AO3 Terms of Service prompt and accepts conditions if the prompt is visible.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line is interrupted mid-execution.

    • handleAdultContentAgreement

      private void handleAdultContentAgreement(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method checks for an AO3 Adult Content Agreement prompt and accepts conditions if the prompt is visible.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • checkArchiveVersion

      public void checkArchiveVersion(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws ArchiveVersionIncompatibleException

      This method checks the OTW Archive version of the AO3 website to confirm support.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveVersionIncompatibleException - If the parsed OTW Archive version is not found in the version table.

    • filterText

      private ArrayList<String> filterText(List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> chapterText, String sessionId)

      This method is a utility for parsing text from a list of WebElement objects into an ArrayList.

      Parameters:
      chapterText - The text from the list of WebElement objects.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of text formatted as strings.

    • parseMetaItems

      private ArrayList<String> parseMetaItems(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement metaSection, String metaSectionClass, String sessionId)

      This method parses comma-separated items from WebElement objects in a story metadata section into an ArrayList.

      Parameters:
      metaSection - The WebElement object containing the story metadata.
      metaSectionClass - The name of the class where specific story metadata is contained.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of metadata values formatted as strings.

    • parseMetaStats

      private ArrayList<String> parseMetaStats(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement storyStats, String storyStatsClass, String sessionId)

      This method parses specific story metadata statistical information. It takes the class name of the wanted statistic and outputs a pair of strings specifying the statistic and the value.

      Parameters:
      storyStats - The WebElement object containing the story statistics.
      storyStatsClass - The name of the class where a specific story statistic is contained.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of the statistic and the statistic's value.

    • parseStoryMetaTable

      private ArchiveStoryInfo parseStoryMetaTable(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses the AO3 story metadata table at the top of every story and chapter page.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      A new ArchiveStoryInfo object.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • parseStoryPrefaceInfo

      private void parseStoryPrefaceInfo(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses the story preface information. This includes the story's summary, authors, staring and ending notes, and story associations.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The corresponding story metadata object.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      Returns:

    • parseKudosPage

      private void parseKudosPage(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArrayList<String> kudosList, String sessionId)

      This method parses the names of registered users who have given kudos on a kudos page.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      kudosList - The current list of registered users who have given kudos.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.

    • parseStoryKudos

      private void parseStoryKudos(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses all the names of registered users who have given kudos. If there was a limit put on the number of pages of kudos to look at, then the method will only parse that many pages of kudos.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The corresponding story metadata object.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • parseBookmarkPage

      private void parseBookmarkPage(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArrayList<String> bookmarkList, String sessionId, boolean isPaginated)

      This method parses registered users who have left a public bookmark on a specific page.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      bookmarkList - The current list of registered users who have left a public bookmark.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      isPaginated - Boolean flag for whether the bookmark page has page numbers.

    • parseStoryBookmarks

      private void parseStoryBookmarks(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses all registered users who have left a public bookmark. If there is a bookmark page limit, this method only parses that many bookmark pages worth of users.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The corresponding story metadata object.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • parseChapterText

      private ArchiveChapter parseChapterText(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String pageTitle, String sessionId) throws ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses the chapter text of the web page and creates a ArchiveChapter object.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The corresponding story metadata object.
      pageTitle - The title of the page that the session is currently on.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      An initialized ArchiveChapter object.
      Throws:
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If method does not detect a div element with story paragraphs.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • createCommentsPlaceholderReference

      private org.openqa.selenium.WebElement createCommentsPlaceholderReference(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver)

      This method creates a fresh comments placeholder reference.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      Returns:
      A WebElement representing the comments placeholder element.

    • parseCommentThread

      private void parseCommentThread(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement commentThreadElement, Integer threadDepth, String sessionId, ArrayList<ArchiveComment> parentCommentList, Integer pageCount)

      This method parses a single comment thread level into a list of comments. If this method detects a response to the current comment that it's on, it utilizes recursion to go deeper into the thread.

      Parameters:
      commentThreadElement - The web element containing the comment thread.
      threadDepth - The current depth level for where we are in the thread.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      parentCommentList - The references to the parent ArrayList of comments.
      pageCount - The current page number of comments.

    • parseCommentPage

      private void parseCommentPage(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId, ArrayList<ArchiveComment> pageCommentList, Integer pageCount)

      This method parses a single page worth of comments. It manually sets the thread depth for parseCommentThread() to 1 to start with top level comments.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      pageCommentList - The references to the ArrayList of page comments.
      pageCount - The current page number of comments.

    • parseChapterComments

      private void parseChapterComments(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveChapter newArchiveChapter, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException

      This method parses all comments in a chapter. If there is a comment page limit, then this method parses only up to that many pages.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      newArchiveChapter - The in-progress AO3 chapter.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.

    • parseChapter

      private ArchiveChapter parseChapter(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String pageTitle, String sessionId) throws ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException

      This method completely parses an AO3 chapter from a AO3 page.

      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The corresponding story metadata object.
      pageTitle - The title of the page that the session is currently on.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      A completely parsed AO3 chapter.
      Throws:
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If session cancellation is detected by the checkForCancel() method.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If method does not detect a div element with story paragraphs.

    • createChapter

      public ArchiveChapter createChapter(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws InterruptedException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveElementNotFoundException, ArchivePageNotFoundException

      This method is an API for creating a chapter from scratch. This method assumes that you have already navigated to the AO3 chapter you want to parse.

      When using the Spring Boot application, the server will assign a session ID so that clients can track the parsing progress remotely. However, if you are just using the archive ingestor as a library POJO, then you can pass in a blank string (i.e. "") as the session ID.

      Here is an example of using the method outside of Spring Boot:

      

ArchiveIngestor ingestor = new ArchiveIngestor(null, null, null, null, 3, 5, 10, 3, 3, 3);
RemoteWebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver(
     new URI(urlToSeleniumContainer).toURL(), new ChromeOptions()
);
driver.get(urlToArchiveChapter);
ingestor.createChapter(driver, "");
      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      A completed archive chapter.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line in handleTOSPrompt is interrupted mid-execution.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If parseChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If parseChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveElementNotFoundException - If a NoSuchElementException is experienced throughout the chapter parsing process.
      ArchivePageNotFoundException - If the current driver does not return a page title or if the page title is AO3's 404 page.

    • createChapter

      public ArchiveChapter createChapter(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, ArchiveStoryInfo parentArchiveStoryInfo, String sessionId) throws InterruptedException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveElementNotFoundException

      This method is an API for creating a chapter using an existing ArchiveStoryInfo object. This method assumes that you have already navigated to the AO3 chapter you want to parse.

      This method should only be used in cases where you already have parsed the AO3 story's or chapter's metadata, such as if you have used createChapter(driver, sessionId) or createStory(driver, sessionId), and can retrieve the ArchiveStoryInfo object to use for a new chapter parsing.

      When using the Spring Boot application, the server will assign a session ID so that clients can track the parsing progress remotely. However, if you are just using the archive ingestor as a library POJO, then you can pass in a blank string (i.e. "") as the session ID.

      Here is an example of using the method outside of Spring Boot:

      

ArchiveIngestor ingestor = new ArchiveIngestor(null, null, null, null, 3, 5, 10, 3, 3, 3);
RemoteWebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver(
     new URI(urlToSeleniumContainer).toURL(), new ChromeOptions()
);
driver.get(urlToArchiveChapter);
ingestor.createChapter(driver, alreadyExistingArchiveStoryInfo, "");
      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      parentArchiveStoryInfo - The existing ArchiveStoryInfo object.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      A completed archive chapter.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line in handleTOSPrompt is interrupted mid-execution.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If parseChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If parseChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveElementNotFoundException - If a NoSuchElementException is experienced throughout the chapter parsing process.

    • createStory

      public ArchiveStory createStory(org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver, String sessionId) throws InterruptedException, ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException, ArchiveIngestorCanceledException, ArchiveElementNotFoundException, ArchivePageNotFoundException

      This method is an API for creating a story from scratch. This method assumes that you have already navigated to the AO3 story you want to parse.

      When using the Spring Boot application, the server will assign a session ID so that clients can track the parsing progress remotely. However, if you are just using the archive ingestor as a library POJO, then you can pass in a blank string (i.e. "") as the session ID.

      Here is an example of using the method outside of Spring Boot:

      

ArchiveIngestor ingestor = new ArchiveIngestor(null, null, null, null, 3, 5, 10, 3, 3, 3);
RemoteWebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver(
     new URI(urlToSeleniumContainer).toURL(), new ChromeOptions()
);
driver.get(urlToArchiveStory);
ingestor.createStory(driver, "");
      Parameters:
      driver - The RemoteWebDriver being used to run a Selenium session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the current parsing session.
      Returns:
      A completed archive story.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the Thread.sleep() line in handleTOSPrompt is interrupted mid-execution.
      ArchiveParagraphsNotFoundException - If createChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveIngestorCanceledException - If createChapter() returns the exception.
      ArchiveElementNotFoundException - If a NoSuchElementException is experienced throughout the story parsing process.
      ArchivePageNotFoundException - If the current driver does not return a page title or if the page title is AO3's 404 page.

    • returnFailedFuture

      public CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData> returnFailedFuture(String resultMessage, String sessionId)

      This method is a Spring Boot specific method for returning CompletableFuture objects for failed parse sessions.

      Parameters:
      resultMessage - The end message to save for the parse session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the parse session.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture containing ArchiveServerFutureData denoting a failed parse.

    • returnCompletedFuture

      public CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData> returnCompletedFuture(String newJSONString, String resultMessage, String sessionId)

      This method is a Spring Boot specific method for returning CompletableFuture objects for successful parse sessions.

      Parameters:
      newJSONString - The JSON string to send back to the client requesting the parse.
      resultMessage - The end message to save for the parse session.
      sessionId - The session ID of the parse session.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture containing ArchiveServerFutureData denoting a successful parse.

    • startCreateTask

      @Async("archiveServerAsyncExecutor") public CompletableFuture<ArchiveServerFutureData> startCreateTask(String link, String sessionId, ArchiveParseType parseType, int newMaxCommentThreadDepth, int newMaxCommentPageLimit, int newMaxKudosPageLimit, int newMaxBookmarkPageLimit)

      This method is a Spring Boot specific method for starting a general parsing session. It takes a pre-verified AO3 story link, a session ID, and the parse type along with custom parsing limits from the requesting client.

      Parameters:
      link - The pre-verified AO3 story link.
      sessionId - The session ID of the parse session.
      parseType - A ArchiveParseType.
      newMaxCommentThreadDepth - A custom max comment thread depth value from requesting client.
      newMaxCommentPageLimit - A custom max comment page limit value from requesting client.
      newMaxKudosPageLimit - A custom max kudos page limit value from requesting client.
      newMaxBookmarkPageLimit - A custom max bookmark page limit value from requesting client.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture containing ArchiveServerFutureData.
